author: ggregory
msg: [VFS-452] HttpFileObject read/write attributes should reflect underlying FileSystem capabilities.

author: simonetripodi
msg: create the 'all' converters module my including dependencies *source* packages in order to:
* generate the right META-INF/services/com.google.inject.Module file, which was not merged;
* generate the right OSGi metadata - the bundle-plugin, not finding anything in the compile classpath, didn't include any o.a.onami.converters.* package
The 'side effect' of that approach is that modules have to be compiled turning the 'release' profile on, in order to generate the -sources artifacts that can be included in the 'all' module

author: acmurthy
msg: Merge -c 1423706 from trunk to branch-2 to fix YARN-3. Add support for CPU isolation/monitoring of containers. Contributed by Andrew Ferguson.

author: kwright
msg: Get the basic structure of the parser right.
